title: Yahoo mail not works properly on Firefox
content:
Hi all,

Ubuntu 22.04

Yahoo mail can't work properly on Firefox, unable to browse files on computer for attaching it to mail. Attach files -> attach files from computer no response

Please help. Thanks

Remark: Yahoo mail works without problem on Chrome, same PC

Regards
creator: satimis

title: I want to go to a website with "www2" and the "2" keeps being removed.
content: Why isthe "2" always removed from "www2" when my wife (her computer) types an address into the URL space?
creator: tasmith

title: Ctrl+F does not work in Firefox browser
content: Ctrl+F no longer opens a search box in Firefox browser. Selecting "Find On Page" from Edit menu does not either. Ctrl+F still works fine in MS Edge and Google Chrome, Explorer browsers, notepad, pdf, etc. I tried rebooting computer, disabling all firefox extensions without luck. Anything else I can try?
creator: symcha
